website_summaries.verdict: These tough hangers securely hold even heavier articles of clothing like sweaters and jeans.
pros: Stronger plastic can hold clothes that weigh up to 12 lbs., and thinner 5 mm width saves closet space
Non-shedding premium flocking holds clothes in place
notches to keep straps from slipping
Horizontal bar for ties, scarves, and necklaces
Anti-rust, chrome-plated swivel hooks for easy retrieval
cons: A few complaints about hooks breaking off or product arriving with broken hooks

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, but fantastic if you need non-slip hangers
customer_reviews.text: I actually really hate these hangers. Hate, hate, kill it with fire, hate them. Clothing sticks to them and it's really annoying. So why the four star rating? They're well made and exactly as described. If you have clothing that falls off of other hangers, these are the ticket. Many of my wife's tops are hard to keep on a wood or plastic hangar, but no problem with these things. If a t-shirt gets near one of these things, though, it sort of grabs the hanger everywhere the two touch. They're great non-slip hangers. It just turns out that I really hate non-slip hangers . . .
customer_reviews.author: Greg A.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage is an understatement
customer_reviews.text: Unless you really love, and I mean truly LOVE doing laundry, then these hangers are NOT for you. Because of their felt coating, it will take you approx. 47 minutes and 59 seconds to hang one article of clothing. I thought I hated wire hangers until I got ahold of these unforgiving spawns of satan. These are absolutely useless. At least wire hangers provide cheap means to abortions. They may not deserve 1 star because it's my fault that I didn't read into the description of them, but i really can't recommend them, even to my worst enemies.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Removes the chaos!
customer_reviews.text: I've spent several weeks redoing my 12' long closet -- painting, woodwork refinishing, new shelving and pole, and adding new storage solutions at each end. There was no way dozens of mismatched wire hangers from the dry cleaner would suffice! Enter these beauties. Slim profile, sturdy, with non-slip flocking and that fantastic little bar below the hook -- perfect for belts or scarves. I bought four boxes (e.g., 16 hangers per foot = 192): such a bargain! The best part is these things are impossible to tangle. On a daily basis, they have removed the chaos and improved my outlook. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry S. Kappel

customer_reviews.title: Not slim!
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT space saving hangers. They actually take up more space than the plastic hangers. I thought they would be like the slim hangers on the left in my picture.
customer_reviews.author: EDB

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty crappy quality, almost all hangers broke and I will strongly recommend to not buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Live InFull

customer_reviews.title: Tend to Warp
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for 6 months. I used about half of them immediately and hung the rest in closet to use later. They appear to be of good quality. And are very good at keeping clothing from sliding on hanger and stretching shirt necks..... nothing slides on the coating. Great. At 6 months I can't comment on the durability of these and how long they'll last. The problem I have seen is warping, or bowing. Over half have done this....some a little more than others. So, if you don't demand your hangers to be 'straight', then these will be fine
customer_reviews.author: Ed M.

customer_reviews.title: Not gray. Green. Beware.
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed. Waste of time. They are not gray. They are sage green.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than normal
customer_reviews.text: I guess it is my fault for not reading the size of the hangers (not sure it was in the description) . They are at least 2 inches shorter than a normal hanger. I have to pull up on the shoulders of the garment as to not leave marks on the neck of the garment. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Stoller

customer_reviews.title: like the hook came off
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned with some reviews but decided to try. Only one hanger has broke, like the hook came off. You are able to turn there tops so it goes the other way, just requires some initial force. They can potentially leave lint on light colored clothing. Other than that. They are doing their job.
customer_reviews.author: Betty L.

customer_reviews.title: It really grabs your clothes.
customer_reviews.text: I simply needed more hangers and purchased these as convenient and inexpensive. I am a man and most of my clothes are Polo Shirts and Khaki Pants. I have trouble getting the clothes on and off the hangers. If you have clothes that slide off other hangers, these would be great. But for me, I don't like them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Hangers at a wonderful Price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed hangers for my sweaters and these really fit the bill! They are very strong and hold even the heaviest of sweaters. The felt has not rubbed off or shed at all so far. It seems like that won't be a problem, but have only had them for a week and even with using them quite a bit (especially with my favorite comfy sweater) there has not been any issues. I would highly recommend these hangers and will buy again when I fully use the first 50 I got. You really can't beat the price either! Give them a try!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy velvet hangers with just the right amount of non-slip
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bunch of velvet hangers for my daughter that ended up being too tacky, a little too large and flimsy. It was hard to get clothes on and off the hangers and they were kinda wobbly under load. NOT THESE hangers. When I got the Cresnel hangers, I quickly realized that first of all, they were a nice medium size - just right for most articles of clothing. Second of all, they were really sturdy, not wood hanger sturdy, but close enough. Finally, the non-slip was just right. I could get clothes off and on easily, but they stayed on the hanger. If you want non-slip velvet hangers - these are my top recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: Mixed Desmid

customer_reviews.title: Modern Gray = Sage Green, If You Care
customer_reviews.text: I am replacing all the flocked hangers in my closet with gray ones. (Always wanted to do this -- matching hangers -- new home, new closet, go for it!). However, these gray hangers do not match the gray hangers I got before, which were more of a dove gray. In fact, I would call the "modern gray" of these hangers "sage green". Really, they are quite green. They are sturdy and slip-free and all those good things, but I had to send them back. Just be forewarned in case you care.
customer_reviews.author: Oakley

customer_reviews.title: I knew I liked the non-slip velvet hangers and ordered these because they ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow walk-in closet with hanging racks on both sides. I knew I liked the non-slip velvet hangers and ordered these because they are an inch SHORTER width than the ones I had before. Now that they are on both sides of the closet, I've got 2 more inches of walking room. Sounds as if that shouldn't make a difference, but it does! Seem adequately sturdy so far. Glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizeon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, thinner than most.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these bc we always seemed to be out of hangers and I have never been happy with breaking the plastic ones. When these arrived I was surprised at how thick they were. They are not as fat as the traditional plastic hangers, but they are still not what I would consider thin. The velvet coating is nice and it will help keep my clothes hanging, but I don't think it will be as space saving as I originally planned.
customer_reviews.author: The Authentic Dan

customer_reviews.title: These hangers are just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for hangers that are non slip, easy to use and that do not break. I received 50 of these about a week ago and have been having so much fun reorganizing my closet with them. I can honestly say they are perfect! Nothing falls off them, the hanger tops swivel perfectly 360 degrees and they look and feel great! I can’t believe they can make and sell such great hangers so reasonably!! Will buy more for my fiancé as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durability and Functionality
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt aware this hanger had an extra area inside of it to maybe hang a belt it something. If all your handling are shirts, sweaters and jackets, this hanger is fine. However, I found it difficult to get my hand inside to stuff the bottom of pants to hang. Going from the top of the pants, impossible. I would never ordered this product had I seen that. It is shown in the picture but you have to look closely. I may not have paid that close attention when reading about it, my fault.
customer_reviews.author: J Sears

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: These velvet hangers tend to break so I needed some new ones. This is an excellent price for so many hangars, and they do seem to be well-made. The ones from the knick-knack stores tend to stick to each other and the actual hanger part gets stuck and you can't rotate it. These seem very smooth and the neck is movable, and they seem well-made. I've only had them for a week but they're working perfectly so far!
customer_reviews.author: Heather C

customer_reviews.title: So organized...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a little over a year and keep buying more! (I’m slowly switching to these hangers as I do laundry) I love how clean my clothes look hanging up... and how much space they save. I went with felt because I got tired of clothes sliding off hangers, this fixed the problem! As far as durability goes, we’ve only broken ONE of 200 so I think those are good odds. I buy wooden hangers for heavier clothes (coats)
customer_reviews.author: Carter, Urban

customer_reviews.title: More green than dark gray, disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have these hangers in my closet and love them! Ordered more recently a few years after getting the original hangers. As you can see, the “gray” hangers in the plastic that arrived today are like a dark green. I’m looking for dark gray hangers to match this same exact hanger that I already have. I’m disappointed that the color is so far off from the nice gray hangers that I have in my closet from Cresnell. Same exact product, same exact order on Amazon but a very different color.
customer_reviews.author: Heather K

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for women's clothing! Seriously I have to organize my closet weekly to keep the dropped items from piling up at the bottom and no one wants to do that. When I came across these I figured even if they just helped a little I would be happy but they are fantastic!!! holds every type of shirt in place! No slipping of the hanger!! Ive already purchased more to replace ALL of my outdated hangers
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: The perfect affordable solution for getting more into a small space.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly organized closets where all the hangers match. Nirvana. These hangers are felted so items don't "slip off". There are cuts outs for spaghetti straps and tanks. Works well for both tops and pants. The thin size allows for more clothing in a small space. I ordered the clip style hangers as well for skirts. A good all round investment for organization and simplicity. These thin hangers are stronger than plastic and better looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Bryson

customer_reviews.title: Slim velvet hangers rock
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I am loving these velvet hangers and these are of good quality. Update: Have been using these for about four months now and they are working great. They are strong enough to hold heavier clothing items, and as is the case with these velvet hangers, clothes cling to them vs falling off, yet are easy enough to take off when it's time to wear something.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Dyslin

customer_reviews.title: Starting to Break
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had these hangers for very long. A couple of them have already started breaking. The hook from the actual hanger. I wasn't hanging anything heave on it. Just a polo shirt and after about a month or so, they started to break. Hopefully, I'm able to get more use out of the ones that I have left.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Grip
customer_reviews.text: These velvet-covered hangers do what they are advertised to. You can't fault them for that. The problem I have had is that when a garment is placed on them, it is difficult to adjust the garment so it hangs properly. I can see where this could serve to be useful. I just don't happen to have a need for that function.
customer_reviews.author: wb

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy. Incorrect and false product info.
customer_reviews.text: Not Happy. False and misleading product info. Bought them because they were shown as PRIME AND AMAZON CHOICE with over 2200 4.5 stars ? Hangars are sized for Women and Teens. Smaller and weaker than my current velvet hangers these were meant to replace and even those would snap if used to hang my North face Winter coat. Suitable to hang my dress shirts. Better to use suit hangers for heavy Coats.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Holzer

customer_reviews.title: They have a swivel hook. Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that you can rotate the hook part of the hanger. That's new to this type of hanger. ( to me ) I like to hang my clothes facing the same direction, so with these hangers I can grab the hanger and not have to worry about the direction until I get to the closest with them. Saves time. Can get clothes out of dyer faster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: They are definite space makers in the closet. I like that they do not leave shoulder marks and keep my heavier items from sliding off. They do break if you twist them the wrong way or accidentally step on them. This is my third time ordering them and hope to replace all of my plastic and wire hangers.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of these hangers. There is only one thing I do not like. For my sons clothing, I like to just slip on and off hanger fast, but the velvet makes it hard, so that is my only complaint. But, for adult clothing it is perfect, because we do not want the clothing to slip off, for it is larger around the neck, etc... so I will order more for my son and use these for my clothing. they are very nice looking and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Chapman

customer_reviews.title: A little worried
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two packs of 50 hangers. I hung up a dress outside to dry and the metal part separated from the hanger so my dress fell to the ground. I haven't had any other issues, so I am hoping this was just one bad hanger. I will update after I have used them all a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Irma M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Expensive-Looking
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are definitely sturdy and look so much better than my old plastic orange ones. I ordered these in gray and green, and I will say that the color difference between the two is nearly imperceptible. The only "issue" I had is some of the hangers gave off a bit of "dust" but that has not affected my clothing or the durability of the hangers at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Pate

customer_reviews.title: SO sturdy and nonslip!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers SO SO much! They're a smidge more expensive than regular hangers, but absolutely worth it. They don't break unless I put work into it, my clothes don't slide off of them, and the hooks swivel, so if I need to hang something on a door or whatever, it's easy and convenient. And there's an extra bar for me to hang accessories onto. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Nathara

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. The grip from the "velvety" texture is just right. Some reviews I read of these said that the grip is too much for regular cotton. I don't know if people just don't know how to hang clothes or what, but i had no issue hanging clothes made of different types of fabrics. I like that these are skinny so i have more room to hang clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Arianne Miller Haenchen

customer_reviews.title: When you put your clothes on these, they're never coming off
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hangers. Put your clothes on these babies and they're going NOWHERE, and I love it... until I don't. Like when I realize I can't just easily pull the clothes off the hanger when I'm trying on 20 different outfits to wear because I can't make up my mind. Then, when I'm done, I just end up leaving all the clothes on the floor because they're so hard to get back on the hangers. Then like a month goes by and I'm still wondering why I even bought these hangers because my clothes are never on them. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This gave my closet about 3x the space compared to tube hangers. I have a tiny closet so this was a must and worth every penny. If you have thicker clothes, keep in mind that this won’t shrink them. Allows thin cloths to take up the least amount of space which is what is most helpful. If your closet is over full, this will help in some way no doubt. (With the added bonus of purging as you make the swap haha)
customer_reviews.author: Lynn C

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beyond happy with this product. I have the standard ones and used these for heavier winter coats and garments. Space saving for sure compared to standard hangers. Added bonus is that clothes don’t slip off and end up on the floor. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Li

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality! Annoyed!
customer_reviews.text: They were stuck together. The color was grim and the velvet had patches missing. Super annoyed as I have to take time returning and wanted to redo closet this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Granchi

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in April. I took 2 unused hangers out this morning to hang some shirts. Both of them snapped in my hands! Very disappointed in the lack of quality
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than other brands
customer_reviews.text: These are much smaller than other brands I've purchased and my tops and sweaters droop off (I'm a size 2X for reference). I can still use them for my teen's shirts, but I won't be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: These get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these hangers. Enough that I ordered another set a few days after the 1st set was delivered. They have a slim profile and hang shirts beautifully. The velour flocking keep your shirt from falling on the floor, which is the whole point, yea?
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Once you use them you will change all others
customer_reviews.text: Love the no slipping of the velvet, Love the rotation of the hook. You could put a recess for clothes with straps as some others do but not a deal breaker.Whoops you do have the recess that i wanted my bad. I went and looked and it was another brand that didn't. 5 stars for you-all. Good luck. Mike
customer_reviews.author: mike m

customer_reviews.title: Replace all your hangers!
customer_reviews.text: I was soo tired of having multi colored hangers so I bought 2 sets of these (100 hangers) and couldn't be happier. I was a little reluctant to buy them because some reviews mentioned that they were flimsy. But I personally think they're pretty sturdy. The velvet coating makes it a but difficult to put clothes on but the whole point of the velvet is prevent clothes from falling off so that means it's doing its job. They're thin so I was able to add more clothes to my rack.
customer_reviews.author: Khushboo

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers
customer_reviews.text: I really like these hangers and will repurchase if necessary. They have survived my tween daughter and her lazy and sporadic pull here and there. I am pretty impressed with them. I will definitely buy if needed again.
customer_reviews.author: S Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Luv that these hangers keep clothing from sliding off. Also important to me is the hook which lets you dryi clothes in those awkward places. The hangers are not wide enough for my husband's broad shoulders and hit shirt before arm holes begin. I have hangers I can't give away though. Would not order 100 again!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: A definite must have
customer_reviews.text: Just bought these, they are great! For my dresses and nicer tops and jackets. It is not that big of a deal with hanging them, not sure why so many reviews say it takes forever to hang clothes onto it. Its sturdy, no clothes slipped off, easy to put on. Made my closet have more room and looks a lot nicer than the regular hangers. No fuzz came off. I bought one 50 pack and bought 2 extra more packs. They're awesome !
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Mustoe

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I like these hangers because they save space in my closet they are a little flexible and it's difficult to hang T shirts because the fabric sticks to the velvet but they are definitely non slip, which I love. Another issue I found is that they are not all even at the hook, some sit higher than others but not by much so It didn't bother me too badly. Over all good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They’re very sturdy and take up much less space than the plastic hangers. I admit I was a little hesitant to buy them because I have purchased hangers before that were flimsy. These are good quality and I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: nanashobby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. In addition to the standard clothes, I have a full length the shearling coat which probably weighs 10 to 15 pounds. This hanger handles it with no problem. And – nothing slides around.
customer_reviews.author: amanda randall

customer_reviews.title: The Mighty green hanger ?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits in my closet with these grippy and soft hangers. They able to hold up several pants on one hanger. Heavey hoodies, dresses, and heavey coats, I thought would make them bow are still straight. Also I use them by my dryer and the lint doesn't seem to collect on them.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: stylish, streamline, and strong!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome hangers! The velvet hold the garments in place, they're very sturdy, and super stylish looking. I have my winter wool coat hanging on one... I will update this next year after it's been hanging awhile, but it doesn't seem to be straining. I do wish the tops swiveled so you don't have to hang your clothes in the right direction when putting them on the hanger, but that's a minor complaint. The extra bar for a scarf or belt is great, too!
customer_reviews.author: KTM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and hook part rotates!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty nice. I like the calm green color. The hooks do turn. I was a little worried about hanging heavy winter jackets, but it’s pretty sturdy! No bend or give that I could tell. I dropped one hanger and it didn’t break, so here’s to hoping the whole set is good.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gee

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy These
customer_reviews.text: The hooks are all loose. Merely tap the closet rail with the hook and it pops off the hanger. Just rearranged about half a dozen shirts in closet and half the hooks popped off the hangers I used. The others look fragile at the joint too. Weird that I had to put at least one star just in order to post a review.
customer_reviews.author: JerryJT

customer_reviews.title: Does not match previous order
customer_reviews.text: I know I know First world problem. I previously purchased 50 of these and now I needed more. Because I dont want a closet full of mismatched hanger I simply reordered what I had bought before. The shades of gray are vastly different and the chrome hanging piece at the top is even 1/4" longer. So I still wound up with what looks like mismatched hangers. Its not a massive problem but not the effect I was looking for. Inconsistent!
customer_reviews.author: Devin L Holiday

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.text: They look nice but..... These are 2 piece hangers. A chrome steel hook screwed into a rubber base. If you hang anything heavier than a dress shirt, the base tips right off the hook. Absolute JUNK!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles V Shiel

customer_reviews.title: look great, work great
customer_reviews.text: I only bought the velvet hangers because my new closet is not as big as my old one, and I heard that velvet hangers are space savers. They are! Not only that but they look great and work as they should. I have not used them on heavy coats (I don't own any), but they are wonderful for dresses, wide neck shirts, and thin strap shirts, or pretty much everything. The non-slip is accurate. I pulled on a shirt, expecting it to come off, but it did not. I pulled harder because I was feeling lazy, and nothing. Instead the hanger broke and when I checked the hanger the shirt was still stuck to it. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Hangers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers! I have bought several of them. You just can't yank a pair of pants off of them like a plastic hanger because they will most likely break. The pants don't just fall off of them though! If that makes sense ... lol
customer_reviews.author: P. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing if you have open neck or low neck clothing. I don't mind them with tight neck either, but my boyfriend complains that they get stuck on the hanger. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Biloff

customer_reviews.title: Need measurements included in description.
customer_reviews.text: These are described as suit hangers. Too small and too flimsy! I gave them to my G'daughter for her blouses.
customer_reviews.author: gail e. safford

customer_reviews.title: Hangar good in one way and bad in another way
customer_reviews.text: The width of the hangar is much smaller than your usual velvet hangers. One thing I like about this hanger is you can hang a tie on piece coming down, but it makes it more difficult to hang up pants. It is good for shirts and ties only.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers! In fact, I just bought another two packs of 50, along with the clips for pants. Excellent quality, and they look so beautiful in the closet with all the same hangers, which I'm OCD about.
customer_reviews.author: Lara B.

customer_reviews.title: Best hangers for the best price
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, so much cheaper than any store. I was nervous about them shedding, so ive included a picture of my hand after rubbing them, NO SHEDDING! These also came very neatly packaged, with no broken hangers- They are all sturdy, and able to turn.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: None slip
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I give these a 4 star rather than five is because I have t had them long enough to .judge durability, however I will say based on what have experienced these are well worth buying. They prevent thigs from slipping off the hangers which I was looking for. The price was very good.
customer_reviews.author: C. oliver

customer_reviews.title: They don’t shed
customer_reviews.text: I just received my velvet coat hangers. They are beautiful and I don’t know why people are saying that the velvet rubs off. None of mine do. And I will be buying more. And the price is really great it beats the other stores prices.
customer_reviews.author: Jordee

customer_reviews.title: Best Hanger Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good bye plastic nonsense and hello velvet hangers. These hangers ROCK!! Pants stay in place and blouses do not fall off the hanger. Hooray!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Goldbach

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I like how the hooks can rotate so if I hang the top up the wrong way I can just twist the hook up at the top and It is hung correctly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Space saving product.
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. These are great for saving space and your clothes will not fall off the hanger. There is a small dip close Tot he shoulders for straps as well.
customer_reviews.author: Snow

customer_reviews.title: Needed more hangers
customer_reviews.text: What I like is all one style, I bought a case from a brick & mortar store and it was an assortment. The covering may snag a sweater, but these are designed to not allow clothing to slide off
customer_reviews.author: TomOinGburg

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The hook on the first hanger I picked up in the box broke right out of the hanger. Not sturdy and poorly attached. I returned the hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and Weak!
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely NOT strong enough for a coat. Broke on the very first use. Don’t waste your money unless you’re hanging nothing but lingerie or ties.
customer_reviews.author: Island Crew

customer_reviews.title: These Hangers are Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with these hangers! None of my slippery clothes fall off of the hangers, which was the point of buying them. They were not expensive and loved the fact there were 50 of them in the box--won't have to buy more for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Light & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I got rid of all those old cheap hangers and replaced with these. I have been using them for 4 years and love them. Just ordered another pack. They are light, but sturdy and my clothes don’t slip off the hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie K

customer_reviews.title: If you are on the fence YES THEY ARE GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: I am super picky! I found these hangers great for all types of clothing. They really don't slip, they are very slim and sleek! I love them and actually bought more to do all the clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Correct Measurements
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to be used in a wardrobe. I did not pay attention to the measurements of the wardrobe when I purchased it and the hangers I currently had would not let me shut the wardrobe door. These were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: judith

customer_reviews.title: Great for heavier clothing
customer_reviews.text: We love the non slip hangers but found the standard ones continually snapped with the weight of men's heavier clothing. The center brace on these makes it better for menswear. No more broken hangers using these.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria N.

customer_reviews.title: I really like these!
customer_reviews.text: When you have slippery clothes, you need a hanger that is going to keep them from falling off! They seem nice. I will have to update in time, but chances are, I will buy more of these because I really like them!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Star

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these hangars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these hangars. Not only do I love slim hangars, but these still have a slight indentation for smaller straps and they don't let the clothes slide off. The color is lovely and simple and the price is great. If you are one of those people that like to have all of your hangars matching then this is a great option for you. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: DorothyZ

customer_reviews.title: Saves space
customer_reviews.text: I received these hangers as a gift. After exchanging my big plastic hangers these look great. Same amount of hangers but closet does not look jammed. I ended up buying several more packs and did my other closet. Wondered if I could put damp clothes I don't dry in the dryer. These hangers work well. But I did keep several plastic hangers for very wet things. Nothing falls off these things. I am glad I have them.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and No Clothes Slipping Off the Hanger!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty awesome! I’ve had plastic hangers for years and I’m not sure why it took me so long to switch to these, but I’m glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made hangers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a teenager who is really rough on things. These are sturdy enough to stand up to her. She has a habit of leaving them on her bed or floor and they have yet to snap when stepped or sat on.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Colunga

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy hangers
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are being used on my jeans and I can't believe I've waited this long to get these slim line hangers. I love them and wish I had more. They are somewhat pricey but if you can afford them and want a good quality hanger, buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Very light, non-slick multipurpose hangers
customer_reviews.text: Almost as light as wire hangers but not as flimsy. The velvet coating prevents slick clothing from sliding off, including regular trousers regardless of material (such as leather, polyester or even just plain cotton) and silk ties. Being thin, they occupy almost no space whatsoever, in and of themselves. They are perfect for my requirements and I'm very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Voracious Reader-Consumer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE CRESNEL HANGERS
customer_reviews.text: Cannot believe I did not buy these hangers before. They are fabulously AWESOME. My clothes are stacked neatly on these hangers, takes up much less space and less bulky. My dresses, shirts, pants do not slip off... they stay firmly in place. My closet looks so much neater and organized. I can also fit more items because these hangers are so slender and lightweight. GREAT BUY and will buy more..
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than other hangers
customer_reviews.text: We liked the hangers but they are small. If you wear an adult small they may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: R. N.

customer_reviews.title: Grown up hangers
customer_reviews.text: My clothes ALWAYS fall off plastic hangers. To the point that I stopped using them and just folded clothing. I took a chance on buying these and WOW!!! I feel like I have a grownup closet now. Even the bigger item of clothing (I'm plus size) fits and STAYS!!! I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Harnishfeger

customer_reviews.title: Worth it it’s classy and functional
customer_reviews.text: Had a couple broken on delivery but velvet hangers is where it’s at lol shirts don’t slide hold your collar In place and unstretched looks like a more mature appeal I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal c

customer_reviews.title: Great Hangers
customer_reviews.text: They are a slim profile so don't take up any room. They're gripping, so the clothes don't slide off of them. Surprisingly sturdy. I'll buy more if I find I need more hangers. Good product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough about these hangers. They hang everything. Strappy dresses and shirts, open neck shirts, odd neck shirt, peekaboo sleaves, and more. They are even more wonderful for the price. I highly reccomend these.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: I keep buying more!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers! They really do help save space in a closet and my clothes dont fall off of them. I keep buying more every few months. Soon all my closets will have them!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D'Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing quality, take it from a hanger snapper! I'm always breaking hangers in my closet or having clothes slip off. Bought these and I don't know why I didn't make the move years ago! They hold my heavy carhartt and my delicate dress tops without fail.
customer_reviews.author: RedHeadedNinja

customer_reviews.title: A Hanger 2 Hang on 2
customer_reviews.text: Great set of hangers! Thin yet super strong! No shedding! These are great for space-saving and organizing...and would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Tamia

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered these twice. I really love them. They hold clothes in place and don’t take up extra space. Very happy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality velvet hangers at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Went with these hangers because all the other hangers on Amazon had issues with flimsiness and shedding. Very happy with these hangers and didn’t have any of the issues from the reviews of other hangers. Go with these! Sturdy velvet hangers that do exactly what you need them to do, what else do you need? (Btw unpaid for review) :)
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Gan

customer_reviews.title: Favorite hangers!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several hundred of these hangers recently and love them. I researched many others on Amazon before I decided on these. They have been perfect and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: hchambley

customer_reviews.title: cheap hangers - they brake easily
customer_reviews.text: not the best hangers in the world. heavy coats put stress on them. if you move them around a lot they don't hold up. would not recommend unless you want a cheap set of hangers you will have to replace sooner than you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality velvet hangers
customer_reviews.text: I bought three boxes of these hangers to replace all the various different hangers I have in my closet. I wanted all non-slip velvet and these are great. They have a very slim profile, so I feel I can fit more clothes and they look more neatly arranged now that I have replaced all the odd hangars I have. So far so good. I will purchase more of these as I need them.
customer_reviews.author: PDonnaM

customer_reviews.title: They work well
customer_reviews.text: I personally think these work well and leave much less of a “bump” than other hangers. Only one has broken (the metal came out of the body when it was pulled pretty awkwardly).
customer_reviews.author: Sean&Amanda

customer_reviews.title: No more tops sliding off the hangers
customer_reviews.text: Great hangers, look a lot nicer than our hodge podge collection of plastic banners. I split them with my daughter. They've worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: perfect hanger better than padded.
customer_reviews.text: these hangers are perfect for most any item. I would hesitate on a heavy item like long coat etc. Then I would use two. They are so good with knits, and sweaters unbelievably perfect. I have purchased 100 in total replacing all my old broken ineffective hangers to help preserve my clothes. We pay real money these days for nice clothes best to help save on their wear.
customer_reviews.author: Chimmie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice, and don't shed velvet coating.
customer_reviews.text: Really really like these- sturdy enough for my heavier clothing, and camisoles and scarves don't slip off. I bought about 150 of these and changed my closet over- finally got rid of the plastic hangers. It's a pleasure going into the closet now!
customer_reviews.author: Dulcinea El Toboso

customer_reviews.text: If you're wanting your close to stick well, these are your hangers. I think they are great, i just personally didn't like how tough it was to put stuff on and off due to the velvet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: CRESNEL Velvet Hangers 50 Pack - Extra Strong to Hold Heavy Coat and Jacket - Non-Slip & Space Saving Design Excellent for Men and Women Clothes - Rotating Chrome Hook - Modern Gray Color
feature_bullets: Original Cresnel brand now with 2018 newly improved quality made of premium grade plastic. It is stronger and more durable than ever. Bendable 180-degree side to side without break. Rest assure that it will steadily hold even the heaviest clothes in your closet, up to 12 pounds.

Non-slip velvet surface with grooved shoulder help keep even the silkiest clothes secured on hanger. No more clothes falling off to the ground. Unlike cheap competitor, our premium quality flocked velvet does not shed or stain your clothes.

Space saving slim design at 5mm thick, allow you to optimally utilize your closet space. Keep more clothes neatly organized with ease. Although slim in design, it is durable and strong for long lifetime saving you money.

Natural shoulder shaped design keeps your clothes look natural without the annoying crease or bump. Save you additional time and effort from ironing. Built-in horizontal accessory bar allows you to hold ties, scarves and necklaces with your clothes all together in one hanger.

Swivel hook allow you to retrieve and install clothes much easier and efficient. Cresnel hook is plated with 100% real chrome, not the imitating dull looking steel. The shiny chrome not only rust-proof it also give a sense of luxury look to your closet. Compare ours and competitor side by side and see the difference!
